channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK IVF couples use legal loophole to rank embryos based on potential IQ, height and health
item.description: British fertility clinics raise scientific and ethical objections over patients sending embryos’ genetic data abroad for analysis What is polygenic em...

item.title: ‘Bloodshed was supposed to stop’: no sign of normal life as Gaza’s killing and misery grind on
item.description: The term ceasefire ‘risks creating a dangerous illusion life is returning to normal’ for Palestinians squeezed into the remaining 42% of their land be...

item.title: Retired UK civil servant ordered to pay back £25,000 after pension scheme error
item.description: Eleven years of overpayments leave 63-year-old facing hardship and return to full-time work A retired civil servant faces being forced back into full-...

item.title: Bombed Chornobyl shelter no longer blocks radiation and needs major repair – IAEA
item.description: Drone attack that Ukraine blamed on Russia blew hole in painstakingly erected €1.5bn shield meant to allow for final clean-up of 1986 meltdown site Th...

item.title: Environment Agency faces landfill tax bill worth millions to clear illegal waste
item.description: Exclusive: ‘extremely unhelpful’ policy seen as deterrent to clearing thousands of dump sites across England Millions of pounds in landfill tax owed t...

item.title: Hayden criticises Archer for bringing a pillow to Gabba
item.description: Jofra Archer is criticised by former Australia opener Matthew Hayden for the "shocking look" of arriving for the third day of the second Ashes Test wi...

item.title: US says progress made at talks with Ukraine on plan to end war
item.description: Talks between senior US and Ukrainian negotiators in Florida continue for a third day on Saturday.

item.title: The Papers: 'Netflix seals $85bn Warner Bros deal' and 'One L of a draw'
item.description: The Fifa World Cup 2026 draw features on several Saturday editions.

item.title: Deadly border fighting breaks out between Pakistan and Afghanistan
item.description: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.

item.title: Driving-test touts offer instructors £250 kickbacks so they can bulk-book tests
item.description: Touts use instructor login details to bulk-book tests and sell them at a huge mark-up, the BBC finds.
